org.mmbase.module.builders.vwms

Class aFile2Copy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.module.builders.vwms.aFile2Copy

  • public class aFile2Copy
extends Object
    An object that holds information needed for the transfer of a file. This is used with the CAHE PAGE mechanism, which copies calculated pages to a mirror server. File2Copy objects are handled by the FileCopier class.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Daniel Ockeloen, Pierre van Rooden (javadocs)
    Rename:
    AFile2Copy

        Constructor for the File2Copy object
        Parameters:
        dstuser - User name needed to log on at the destination host
        dsthost - Name of the destination host
        dstpath - Requested path of the file at the destination host
        srcpath - Path of the file at this server
        filename - File name
        sshpath - Path to ssh command
